name: Lost Caves (TimMelnikov)
description:
Mini Jam 85  Theme: Gold Limitation: One-minute timer

No one knows what exactly you will meet in the outside world. the outside world is constantly changing and the further you go, the more dangerous it becomes, but the reward goes up too.

But don't be afraid of death. dying, you will be here again, with the money found you can buy more generators of gold, and with the found coins you can buy yourself a weapon and next time go further.

But remember.  There are two conditions: 

1 - in the outside world there is a one-minute timer, when it ends you will die and return here. The timer can be increased by killing enemies.

2 - upon entering the outside world, all your gold disappears forever. Therefore, the longer you are outside and the more gold generators you have, the further you can go after death.

Good luck!
